‎-我很喜欢来这里喝他的酒

-[Marian] I know... -Did you see it? Chynna, you still saw it.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-你看到了吗？你还是看到了

translation.en: "I got wine too."
That's right.
I get the special wine.
Mich just gets White House wine.
"When I come to Craig's house..."
[Craig] That's right, Ma. You tell her.
"...I just get... The wine is just..."
-I'm gonna have some of this wine. -Here's some of my wine.
translation.zh:
‎-我要尝下这个酒
‎-给你我的酒

translation.en: Here, refill mine.
Let me see. Wait, let me see. Let me see.
[Kelly] Family.
[Michelle] These are my favorite pictures.
[Marian] God, that tree looks ugly.
Because you actually let us decorate the tree.
That's why it looks ugly.
Because a seven-year-old did that.
translation.zh: ‎因为那是一个七岁小鬼装饰的

translation.en: Oh, here's the...
[Marian] Oh, there's the dress.
You can see all these pleats.
[Michelle] Look how pretty you are, Mommy.
-[Craig] Could have been on TV, in movies. -[Michelle] So young.
translation.zh:
‎-美到可以上电视 演电影…
‎-真年轻

translation.en: -Were you excited about your wedding? -[Marian] I think so.
translation.zh:
‎-你当时为结婚感到激动吗？
‎-激动吧

translation.en: At least you weren't pregnant, because I didn't come until later.
translation.zh:
‎至少你不是未婚先孕
‎因为我是你们婚后才出生的

translation.en: "I might have been happy about it."
[Marian] I haven't seen it in a long time, but...
translation.zh: ‎我已经很久没看到他了 但…

translation.en: that was good.
That was good.
[Craig] Do you know, the last time we went through these pictures like this
translation.zh: ‎你们知道上次我们像这样一起看照片

translation.en: had to be when Dad was alive.
[Marian] Mm-hmm.
He just liked people.
[Michelle] Look how handsome Dad is.
[Michelle] I am from the South Side of Chicago.
That tells you as much about me as you need to know.
It was a typical working-class community.
translation.zh: ‎那是个典型的工人阶层社区

translation.en: Some good music,
some good barbecue,
some good times.
Our dinner table was the first table I felt like I belonged.
translation.zh:
‎我家的餐桌
‎是第一张让我有归属感的桌台

translation.en: And then you go out into the world
expecting the same thing.
You're in high school,
you are accomplished.
You are... Was it class treasurer? Do I remember that right?
translation.zh: ‎你是班上的财务干部 对吗？

translation.en: I was senior class treasurer, yes.
translation.zh: ‎我是班级高级财务干部 没错

translation.en: I was still that kid.
You were on the honor roll,
and you went to go see your guidance counselor,
and your brother had gone to Princeton,
translation.zh: ‎因为你哥进了普林斯顿大学

translation.en: and you thought, "I'm gonna aspire to go to Princeton too."
translation.zh: ‎所以你觉得自己也能上普林斯顿

translation.en: But that guidance counselor had other ideas,
translation.zh: ‎但你的辅导老师却不那么认为

translation.en: didn't see in you what you saw in yourself.
translation.zh: ‎她没有看到你看到的自我潜力

translation.en: Yeah, she decided that my wish to go to Princeton
translation.zh: ‎对 她觉得我去普林斯顿

translation.en: was thinking too big,
I was reaching too high.
And at that point, she told me, "I don't think you're Princeton material."
translation.zh:
‎当时她跟我说
‎“我觉得你不是上普林斯顿的料”

translation.en: -The nerve! -Yeah.
Well, she was wrong.
I went back to the school just recently and the principal was like,
translation.zh:
‎我最近刚回了趟高中
‎然后校长跟我说

translation.en: "She doesn't work here anymore."
I was like, "I bet she doesn't."
[Michelle] I share that because obviously it worked out OK. Um...
translation.zh:
‎我分享这段经历
‎是因为最后我还是上了普林斯顿

translation.en: But that statement, while I was able to get over it, it was a punch.
translation.zh:
‎但那句话给了我不小的打击
‎我过了很久才缓过来

translation.en: I'm still a little salty...
...about that.
Still a little salty about it.
Your book really stuck to me,
how just so much that African-American women go through
translation.zh: ‎让我切身看到非裔美国女人的经历

translation.en: and African-American individuals go through, as a whole.
And we go through those alone.
We don't have backup. We don't have support.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有援助 没有帮助

translation.en: With me being a first-generation student,
I've lived in subsidized housing all my life.
translation.zh: ‎一直以来都住在政府补助的房子里

translation.en: I didn't believe that I would be sitting
translation.zh: ‎我真的想不到自己能有一天

translation.en: next to the former First Lady of the United States.
translation.zh: ‎能坐在前美国第一夫人的身边

translation.en: And I just wanted to know, how did you, as a black woman,
persevere through, just, invisibility?
translation.zh: ‎你如何克服被忽视的这一困境？

translation.en: For me, I never felt invisible.
And I think, in thinking through my story about why do I not now feel invisible,
translation.zh:
‎我觉得在我回顾我过去的人生
‎为何没有这种感觉

translation.en: I think it's because my parents
made me always feel visible.
translation.zh: ‎总是让我觉得我是被关注的

translation.en: It came from not what was going on in the world,
but what was going on at my dinner table.
translation.zh: ‎而是我在家里的餐桌上感受到的

translation.en: My mother, she let us ask anything.
translation.zh: ‎我母亲允许我们问任何问题

translation.en: You had to be polite.
We got spankings if we were too... You know?
translation.zh: ‎如果我们太…你懂得 就会被打屁股

translation.en: -She was still a black mother. -[laughter]
But that invisibility, it starts here.
We can't afford to wait for the world to be equal to start feeling seen.
translation.zh:
‎我们不能光等着世界看到我们
‎给予我们公平

translation.en: We're far from it.
Time will not allow it.
It's not going to happen with one president, one vote.
translation.zh: ‎这不是一个总统 一张投票能解决的

translation.en: So you've gotta find the tools within yourself to feel visible,
translation.zh:
‎所以你要在你自己身上找办法
‎让自己不被忽视

translation.en: and to be heard, and to use your voice.
I have high expectations of young people.
It's the same expectations my family had of me.
My grandfather Dandy expected us to be great.
translation.zh: ‎我爷爷丹迪希望我们能成为伟人

translation.en: But he went through life being underestimated.
translation.zh: ‎但他一生都没有受到应有的重视

translation.en: Growing up, he was a brilliant young man,
translation.zh: ‎我爷爷年轻时是个优秀的青年

translation.en: somebody that loved to read books,
loved to delve into things in a deep and meaningful way.
He could have been a professor. He could have been a doctor.
translation.zh: ‎他本可以成为一名教授、医生

translation.en: But because of race and class,
he couldn't get into colleges.
He didn't have the money, the resources...
And imagine walking around with all this ability,
translation.zh: ‎他就这样满怀能力和抱负 寻寻觅觅

translation.en: and the world telling you, "No.
No, you're not good enough. No, you're not ready."
Watching people half your intelligence
translation.zh: ‎只能眼睁睁看着能力仅及你一半的人

translation.en: being promoted past you.
You know, watching opportunities slip away,
translation.zh: ‎眼睁睁看着机会从指缝流走

translation.en: not because you're not able, but because nobody thinks you deserve it.
translation.zh:
‎并不是因为你没有能力
‎而只是因为没人相信你能胜任

translation.en: That caused him a lot of disappointment and anger.
translation.zh: ‎这带给了他极大的失望和悲愤

translation.en: That made him push us to be better.
translation.zh: ‎也成了他推动我们前进的动力

translation.en: [woman] This is a super-normal Wednesday.
translation.zh: ‎（圣保罗岛 明尼苏达州） ‎这是个极度平常的周三

translation.en: Very normal.
Every so often a book comes along that creates bridges.
translation.zh: ‎不时总是会有那么一本书能创造桥梁

translation.en: [Michelle] Yeah.
[woman 2] So we thought it was a great idea to bring two book clubs together
translation.zh: ‎所以我们把两个读书俱乐部聚到一起

translation.en: to talk about their unique experiences with the book,
translation.zh: ‎来聊聊大家与这本书的独特的经历

translation.en: but also the common things.
You come from Chicago, also.
translation.zh:
‎-你也是从芝加哥来的
‎-我父母是

translation.en: -Where did you grow up? -My mom's from Gresham.
translation.zh:
‎-你在哪里长大的？
‎-我妈妈来自格瑞萨姆

translation.en: [Michelle] That's where Barack organized.
translation.zh: ‎贝拉克曾在那里为社区服务

translation.en: But it was fascinating to read because they were lifelong,
translation.zh:
‎但读这本书真的很受教
‎因为他们在那里住了一辈子

translation.en: they lived there, they grew up there, family there, steeped there.
translation.zh:
‎他们在那里生活
‎长大、组建家庭、经历人生起落

translation.en: And they were definitely part of the white flight.
translation.zh: ‎而且绝对是白人大迁移的一部分

translation.en: [woman 2] Do you have a sense of what they were fleeing
translation.zh: ‎你能感受他们逃离时的心境吗？

translation.en: -when they decided to leave? -Or did they even know?
translation.zh: ‎你能感受他们逃离时的心境吗？ ‎或者他们自身知道吗？

translation.en: [woman] I don't know that my parents did.
If you look at my parents' parents,
that's when you see, like, the veiled racism.
translation.zh:
‎他们生活的年代
‎充斥着隐晦的种族歧视

translation.en: That's when you would hear the off-the-cuff remarks
translation.zh: ‎人们到处能听到别人的闲言碎语

translation.en: about, like, "Well, they're moving into the neighborhood."
translation.zh: ‎比如“他们要搬到这块区域了”

translation.en: And it was so interesting to read that from your perspective, versus what I knew.
translation.zh:
‎而有意思的一点是我能读到你的观点
‎然后结合我所知道的知识

translation.en: Yeah.
What was going on in the '70s
was that, as black families like ours were moving into neighborhoods,
translation.zh:
‎像我们这样的黑人家庭
‎搬迁到一个区域

translation.en: white families were being scared away.
translation.zh: ‎那里的白人家庭就会被吓跑

translation.en: They were being told, "Sell your home quick.
translation.zh:
‎会有人告诉他们
‎“赶紧卖掉你们的房子

translation.en: Your property values are gonna go down."
translation.zh: ‎这里的市值马上就要下降了”

translation.en: And so they fled further to the suburbs.
You can even see it in class pictures of my kindergarten class
translation.zh: ‎你甚至可以从我的幼儿园班级照片

translation.en: and my eighth-grade class.
translation.zh: ‎还有初二班级照片里看出来

translation.en: I mean, it does something to kids like me,
translation.zh: ‎这件事对像我这样的孩子有一定影响

translation.en: and we have to remember that
as we are pointing out people who belong and don't belong.
translation.zh:
‎因为大家都在区分
‎谁属于这里 谁不属于

translation.en: Because my family, sadly,
was one of those families, to some, who didn't belong.
translation.zh:
‎对某些人来说
‎我家就是不属于这里的家庭之一

translation.en: I ended up going to Princeton.
translation.zh: ‎我最后顺利进入普林斯顿大学

translation.en: I was one of a handful of minority students.
translation.zh: ‎我是为数寥寥的少数族裔学生之一

translation.en: It was the first time in my life where I stood out like that.
translation.zh: ‎那是我人生中第一次那么突出

translation.en: I learned that one of my roommates moved out
translation.zh: ‎我得知我的一个室友搬出去了

translation.en: because her mother was horrified that I was black.
translation.zh: ‎因为我的黑人身份让她妈妈很害怕

translation.en: She felt her daughter was in danger.
I wasn't prepared for that.
In hindsight, I think I needed to go to Princeton to see for myself
translation.zh: ‎我事后回想 我去普林斯顿大学

translation.en: what was all this that I wasn't good enough for.
translation.zh: ‎是为了看看我到底欠缺在哪

translation.en: [Gayle] And then you're in class with some of these guys, and you realized what?
translation.zh:
‎然后你课上的一些人
‎让你意识到了什么？

translation.en: Well, they're not that smart.
And it's not even just an image that we have.
translation.zh: ‎我们的形象不是自己建立的

translation.en: It's an image that we're given.
People have told us, "No, these are the things that aren't for you."
translation.zh:
‎别人跟我们说
‎“你们不适合做这些事”

translation.en: So one of the most empowering things as a young person
translation.zh:
‎所以作为年轻人
‎我们所能做的最赋权增能的事之一

translation.en: was to go to one of the top schools
and realize that there are all kinds of affirmative action.
translation.zh:
‎但却发现那里有着
‎各种不同的平权措施

translation.en: You know, there's legacy...
Yes.
-[Michelle] There's... -Yes.
There's the college athlete.
And universities have a right and an interest in diversifying.
translation.zh: ‎当然大学有权利与职责提倡多元化

translation.en: The problem is that when it comes to students of color, poor kids,
translation.zh: ‎但是一旦遇上肤色、贫困生的问题

translation.en: all of a sudden, that's affirmative action,
and that's a problem.
-And they're lesser than, yes. -[Michelle] And they're lesser than.
translation.zh:
‎-而且当时是更少有
‎-当时是更少有

translation.en: And I have been at, probably, every powerful table there is in the world.
translation.zh:
‎我几乎到过世上
‎每一个最有权威的桌子

translation.en: I've been at G-summits, I've been in castles and palaces,
translation.zh: ‎我去过世界峰会 去过城堡和宫殿

translation.en: in boardrooms and academic universities.
-And-- -[Gayle] Can I drop the microphone?
-[Michelle] I'm coming down from the... -[drops microphone]
[Gayle] Yes.
You know,
I am coming down from the mountaintop to tell every young person
translation.zh:
‎我从顶峰位置下来
‎就是为了告诉每一个年轻人

translation.en: that is poor and working class,
translation.zh: ‎这就算你贫穷和身处工人阶级

translation.en: and has been told, regardless of the color of your skin,
that you don't belong,
don't listen to them.
They don't even know how they got at those seats.
translation.zh:
‎他们连自己
‎怎么走到那一步的都不知道

translation.en: [Gayle] Yes, yes, yes.
[Michelle] They don't know.
[women] D...
L-P-H-I-N-S!
[woman] Some of these young women that we selected for this activity today
translation.zh: ‎一些我们选中参加这次活动的女孩

translation.en: asked the question, "Why me?"
"You chose me. Why?"
-Well, why not? -[Michelle] That's interesting, yeah.
So, how many of you thought that? Like, "Why me?"
translation.zh:
‎所以你们有多少人那么想过
‎“为什么是我？”

translation.en: [woman 2] There's girls who I feel, like, they are president of this club,
translation.zh:
‎我知道有女孩
‎比如这个俱乐部的主席

translation.en: their ACT, SAT is this, this... Whatever, right?
translation.zh:
‎她们的大学入学考试、学术能力
‎评估测试都很优秀 对吧？

translation.en: I just literally come to school,
I do whatever I have to do,
and then I stay for one club, and that's Latinos Unidos,
translation.zh:
‎然后我留下来参加一个俱乐部
‎就是拉丁美洲俱乐部

translation.en: and then I leave, and then I go to work.
[Michelle] And why do you work?
[Elizabeth] My dad... He had an accident.
He doesn't work like he used to.
Helping him out in some way would make him feel good.
translation.zh: ‎如果我能帮他一点 会让他觉得好些

translation.en: And also because I have three little brothers,
everything that I do is for them.
I go to work and I bring them food.
Like, everything--
And she wonders why she's here.
That story,
with all the highs and lows,
and what seems so ordinary,
and what seems like nothing to you,
translation.zh: ‎这一切对你来说好像没什么

translation.en: is your power.
[Elizabeth] Oof!
Last day.
Chris.
Over here.
Do you have your yearbook?
I am a senior at Whitney Young here in the South Side of Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎我是芝加哥南部的
‎惠特尼杨高中的学生

translation.en: And I am a Mexican girl.
This is my last week of high school.
I remember the first year, I was like, "I want to transfer to a different school.
translation.zh:
‎我还记得我刚入学时
‎我想的是：“我要转校

translation.en: I can't do this work."
Just putting myself down.
-[girl] That's nice. -Yeah. Sorry.
What kept me motivated was
here you get to be friends with people
that are completely different from you,
from different parts of the world,
and I'm very thankful for that.
Girl, you always cry!
Knowing that I'm one of the first ones to graduate high school
translation.zh: ‎我作为我家第一个从高中毕业的人

translation.en: is just very important for my family and I.
[announcer] Elizabeth Cervantes.
[Elizabeth] I'm very excited about what the future holds
and going to college.
It's a huge accomplishment for me.
[woman] When you come out, you'll say, "Hello, Washington DC."
You know, however you would want to maybe identify yourself.
"I worked with the Obamas. I've been an advisor for the Obamas for years.
translation.zh:
‎你可以说：“我跟奥巴马夫妻共事
‎在他们身边做了好几年顾问

translation.en: I'm Valerie Jarrett, your host tonight."
translation.zh:
‎我叫瓦莱丽贾勒特
‎是今晚的主持人”

translation.en: Just do a little establishing.
-[Valerie] OK, I can do that. -Cool.
And then she comes up here. You are in this chair.
translation.zh: ‎然后她走到这里 ‎你坐这张椅子

translation.en: She's in that chair.
And so you guys can hug, wave, sit...
converse.
And now, ladies and gentlemen, please welcome Michelle Obama!
translation.zh:
‎女士们、先生们
‎热烈欢迎米歇尔奥巴马

translation.en: -[Valerie] Hey. -Let's go.
[Michelle] I was in my twenties.
I was a lawyer.
And up until that point,
I had been what I describe in the book as a "box-checker."
translation.zh:
‎我都只是一个照本操课的人
‎正如我在书里描述的那样

translation.en: I was doing what I thought I was supposed to do.
You know, I was an A-student. I got the star.
translation.zh:
‎你看 我是个成绩优异
‎非常出色的学生

translation.en: And that landed me from Princeton to Harvard,
translation.zh: ‎这使我成功从普林斯顿升入哈佛

translation.en: to a firm,
without really thinking about what I cared about.
translation.zh: ‎我都没真正想过我想要什么

translation.en: [Valerie] You start practicing law,
and then, out of nowhere,
comes a young man with a very peculiar name.
translation.zh: ‎出现了一个名字非同寻常的年轻男人

translation.en: And you were supposed to be his mentor.
[Michelle] And then I had to call him on the phone.
This is when I first had a hint that there might be a little something more there.
translation.zh:
‎就是那时我开始觉得
‎事情有不同寻常之处

translation.en: He's like, "Hello?"
And he's got that Barack Obama voice
translation.zh: ‎用的那种贝拉克奥巴马特有的声线

translation.en: that did not match the nerdy image I had in my head.
translation.zh: ‎这跟我想象的书呆子形象大相径庭

translation.en: And I was sort of like, "Whoa!"
I really was like, "Whoa!"
The heat was coming out of the phone from that voice.
translation.zh: ‎被他从话筒里传出的热度击中

translation.en: But then he was late,
and I was like, "Trifling black man, late on the first day."
translation.zh:
‎我当时心想：“这个不起眼的黑人
‎居然在第一天迟到”

translation.en: He flashed that smile.
He was like, "Oh, I'm so sorry."
[in deep voice] "I was... I was late.
I wasn't equipped with an umbrella."
You know, and I started going, "OK."
translation.zh: ‎你们懂的 我就放过他了

translation.en: And he was walking by.
All the secretaries were looking at me, like...
translation.zh: ‎所有的秘书都会看我 示意我…

translation.en: And I was like, "I know. I know, girl."
Get him in the office.
Yeah, it's fun listening to her tell these stories.
-[man] Yeah. -[Barack] Some of which, you know...
Part of me is like, "No.
Hold on a second.
Wait, wait, wait. That's not exactly how it happened."
[Michelle] But because he was my advisee, I was like,
translation.zh: ‎但因为我得指导他 所以我说

translation.en: "Yeah, no, we're not dating."
Because he asked me out probably a month in,
translation.zh: ‎因为大概一个月后 他开始约我出去

translation.en: and I was like, "Dude, that would be so tacky."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“伙计 这真是太俗气了”

translation.en: The two black people from Harvard, you know?
translation.zh: ‎两个哈佛出来的黑人 你懂吗？

translation.en: I was like, "That's what they're waiting for."
It's like, "You guys love each other, don't you?
translation.zh: ‎他们会问：“你们是互相喜欢的吧？

translation.en: You're black, he's black. This will be great."
translation.zh:
‎你是黑人 他也是黑人
‎你们是完美的一对”

translation.en: I was not gonna fall into that stereotype.
translation.zh: ‎我才不会跌入那种固有偏见之中

translation.en: But how do you fall for a guy who's driving a yellow Datsun?
translation.zh: ‎但你要怎么爱上个开黄色达特桑的…

translation.en: Yellow,
with a hole in the floor, that when you're driving,
translation.zh:
‎就那种车底有个洞
‎然后你开车的时候

translation.en: you can see the street as you're moving.
I mean, this was love, y'all.
translation.zh: ‎我想说 这就是爱 各位

translation.en: [Gayle] One day, you guys are hanging out in the middle of the night,
and you see him staring off into space, and you're thinking,
translation.zh: ‎你看到他盯着天空 你想

translation.en: "I wonder if he's thinking about moi?"
And you said, "What are you thinking about?"
It could be, like, income inequality or...
the fate of the black community.
I was like, "Oh, how romantic."
[Gayle] He was a different kind of dude from the very beginning.
He was very different.
And he was different from me,
and he challenged me in different ways.
I knew he was a tsunami coming after me,
translation.zh: ‎我知道他是席卷而来的海啸

translation.en: and if I didn't get my act together,
I would be swept up.
I didn't want to just be an appendage to his dreams.
translation.zh: ‎我不想只是他梦想的附属品

translation.en: So that forced me to work and think,
and make decisions like leaving law.
translation.zh: ‎做出决定 比如离开法律界

translation.en: [Valerie] Well, speaking of your husband...
Wait, this is like when Jay-Z comes out
during the Beyoncé concert.
translation.zh: ‎在碧昂斯演唱会上出现一样

translation.en: You know, that's in "Crazy in Love." It's the same thing.
translation.zh:
‎这是《疯狂的爱》里的歌词
‎完全是现在的写照

translation.en: It's just a little sample...
to enhance...
the concert.
There are a couple of things I would correct.
You don't have to do that here.
-It's my book. -But that's my point.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我的书
‎-但这是我的观点

translation.en: -It's my book, my version of reality. -And we have to drive home together.
translation.zh:
‎-是我的书 我眼中的现实情况
‎-但我们一会要一起开车回家

translation.en: [Michelle] My relationship with Barack was all about our partnership.
translation.zh:
‎我跟贝拉克的关系
‎就是我们的爱人关系

translation.en: If I was gonna have an equal voice
translation.zh:
‎如果我想在这个
‎固执己见的男人面前

translation.en: with this very opinionated man,
I had to get myself up.
I had to set myself off
to a place where I was confident that I was going to be his equal.
translation.zh: ‎我有信心能与他平等的地方

translation.en: The thing that really changed it was the birth of our children.
translation.zh: ‎事情的转折点是我们孩子的出生

translation.en: I wasn't really ready for that.
That really made it harder.
translation.zh: ‎所以孩子的出生让一切更艰难了

translation.en: Something had to give,
and it was my aspirations and dreams.
translation.zh: ‎所以我牺牲了我的抱负和梦想

translation.en: I made that concession,
not because he said, "You have to quit your job,"
but it felt like, "I can't do all of this.
translation.zh: ‎而是我觉得我没办法什么都做

translation.en: So I have to tone down my aspirations.
I have to dial it back."
[Gayle] You shared that you went to marital counseling,
which I think is so important.
[Michelle] Counseling helped me to look at,
"How do I take control of my own happiness within our marriage?"
But it's hard. It's hard.
-It is hard blending two lives together. -[Gayle] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-将两个生命融合在一起非常困难
‎-是的

translation.en: Did the marital counseling help?
I went to five marriage counselors. It didn't help me.
translation.zh: ‎我去过五个婚姻咨询 但没一个有用

translation.en: What was the name of yours?
I should have gone to your guy.
That's what I should have done.
So, did it help?
Because, you know, you think...
You go to marital counseling and you think that they're gonna tell you,
translation.zh: ‎你去婚姻咨询 他们会跟你说

translation.en: "He's right," or "You're right," or, "You're wrong."
-And in my view-- -[Gayle] That's frustrating.
I took Barack to marital counseling
translation.zh: ‎我把贝拉克带去了婚姻咨询

translation.en: so that they fix him.
[Gayle] Yes.
And then he started looking over at me. I was like, "Why are you talking to me?"
translation.zh:
‎然后婚姻咨询看向我
‎我问：“你跟我说干吗？”

translation.en: "I am perfect.
He is the problem."
But one of the things I learned that helped me,
and I think helped our marriage,
translation.zh: ‎也是对我们婚姻有所帮助的事

translation.en: was that my happiness is not dependent on him making me happy.
translation.zh: ‎就是我的幸福不是靠他给我的

translation.en: -Yes. Bravo, yes. -[audience applauding]
And sometimes I felt that that was one of the rubs.
translation.zh:
‎有时我会觉得
‎那是我们之间主要的问题

translation.en: My resentment for him was that Barack was prioritizing himself, in a way.
We had babies; he was at the gym.
translation.zh: ‎我们都有孩子了 但他却泡在健身房

translation.en: I was like, "How do you find time to work out?"
translation.zh:
‎我会好奇
‎“你都是怎么找到时间去健身的？”

translation.en: [Gayle] Yeah. Yes. Yes.
"So let me stop being mad at him for going to the gym
translation.zh: ‎所以我选择不再抱怨他去健身房

translation.en: -and let me get to the gym," you know? -[Gayle] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎反之我自己也开始去健身房

translation.en: [Michelle] Did it feel like a show that you would want to see?
[Barack] Yeah. You're just a good storyteller.
translation.zh: ‎是的 你是个非常棒的故事叙述者

translation.en: Thank you, guys.
translation.zh:
‎-好 谢谢各位
‎-今晚真的很棒 谢谢

translation.en: [woman] Thank you. It was amazing tonight. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-好 谢谢各位
‎-今晚真的很棒 谢谢 ‎谢谢

translation.en: -[Barack] Thank you, guys. -[woman 2] Thank you.
-[Barack] Thank you. -[woman 3] Take it easy.
-[Michelle and Barack] Thank you. -[Barack] Thanks.
[Michelle] Good afternoon.
Can you all...? Oops. Sorry.
Good afternoon!
[crowd] Good afternoon!
[Michelle] This is the Obamas.
This guy you'll hear from later, Barack.
translation.zh: ‎这位一会要演说的人叫贝拉克

translation.en: Sasha, better known as "Natasha," and Malia.
translation.zh: ‎她叫萨沙 也叫娜塔莎 她叫玛利亚

translation.en: And I am Michelle Obama.
-I'm married to this guy. -[cheering]
[Barack] She is fantastic.
She really is.
-[man] Done. Thank you. -[Melissa] Michelle, you ready?
translation.zh: ‎好了 谢谢 ‎米歇尔 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Uh, not today. -OK.
translation.zh:
‎（艾奥瓦州 印第安诺拉市
‎公共图书馆） ‎-还没有
‎-好吧

translation.en: [Melissa] There was something about Michelle Obama.
I quit a job that I had been in for ten years
translation.zh: ‎我辞掉了我从事了十年的工作

translation.en: to go work for her.
As a friend, I have been by her side for almost all of this.
translation.zh:
‎我作为朋友陪她一起
‎经历了一路艰辛曲折

translation.en: See, some beats are just good.
Oh, good Lord.
Do you know Melissa loves Barry Manilow?
translation.zh: ‎你知道莫里莎喜欢巴瑞曼尼洛吗？

translation.en: And I don't even know why we're friends.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道我们怎么变成朋友的

translation.en: We couldn't be more opposite.
That's why we're friends.
Having watched her begin this journey being so nervous,
translation.zh: ‎（新罕布什尔州 伦敦德里） ‎她从一开始真的非常紧张

translation.en: you know, she wasn't crazy about the process.
translation.zh: ‎她真的对这一切完全不热衷

translation.en: She doesn't like politics,
and here we were, dragging her around Iowa.
translation.zh: ‎但我们却拽着她走遍了艾奥瓦州

translation.en: For the first year of the campaign, it was exhausting and not glamorous,
translation.zh:
‎竞选开始第一年非常辛苦
‎毫无乐趣可言

translation.en: and we ate...
a lot of McDonald's.
And she'd lose her voice
by the end of the day,
because that's how hard we were working her; she was that valuable.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们交给她很多事 她非常重要

translation.en: She said to me, "I don't know if this country is ready
translation.zh: ‎她跟我说：“我不知道这个国家

translation.en: for someone like my husband.
translation.zh: ‎是否已准备好接受像我丈夫这样的人

translation.en: I hope they are, but they may not be."
translation.zh:
‎我希望他们准备好了
‎但也可能事与愿违”

translation.en: [Gayle] Here you are on the campaign trail,
and the way that you were vilified in the press,
the way you were misinterpreted in the press,
really, was a horrible time
translation.zh: ‎那真的是一段非常可怕的时期

translation.en: that I think many of us really were not aware.
translation.zh: ‎但我想我们很多人并没有意识到这点

translation.en: Yeah.
Because I was going around the country doing big, huge rallies.
translation.zh:
‎因为我巡回了整个国家
‎进行了非常大型的巡回演讲

translation.en: It was so much fun.
[female announcer] Please join me in welcoming Michelle Obama
translation.zh:
‎请跟我一起欢迎
‎民主党提名候选人奥巴马

translation.en: and the Democratic Party's nominee.
[Michelle] But then the attacks started.
[female anchor] A fist bump? A pound?
A terrorist fist jab?
The gesture everyone seems to interpret differently.
translation.zh:
‎似乎每个人
‎都对这个动作有不同的释意

translation.en: [Michelle] I was becoming effective in the campaign,
so they went after me like they went after a candidate.
translation.zh: ‎所以他们像攻击候选人一样攻击我

translation.en: It blindsided me.
[woman] One way people will try to defeat Obama
translation.zh: ‎他们想用这种方式击败奥巴马

translation.en: is if they can't prove he's a Muslim,
translation.zh: ‎就是如果无法证明奥巴马是穆斯林

translation.en: "Then let's prove his wife is an angry black woman."
translation.zh: ‎那就证明他老婆是个愤怒的黑人

translation.en: And I think it's gonna get ugly.
[male anchor] She's out on the campaign trail.
She's making speeches on behalf of her husband.
She's fair game.
[woman 2] One of her biggest hurdles will be defining herself
translation.zh: ‎她最大的困难就是在别人定义她前

translation.en: before anybody else does.
[Michelle] Over the course of the campaign,
I was telling my story.
I was being vulnerable.
Let me tell you something.
For the first time in my adult lifetime,
I'm really proud of my country.
And not just because Barack has done well,
translation.zh: ‎而这并不只是因为贝拉克做得很好

translation.en: but because I think people are hungry for change.
translation.zh: ‎更多的是因为人们在渴求改变

translation.en: And to have that distorted,
it just felt so wrong.
Does Michelle Obama dislike America?
[man] I think that she's got a chip on her shoulder.
translation.zh: ‎我认为她对美国是有怀恨在心的

translation.en: [man 2] She's got this Stokely Carmichael in a designer dress thing going.
translation.zh:
‎她身着时装礼裙高声阔论
‎像个民权运动领袖

translation.en: Her instinct is to start
with this, "Blame America," you know, "I'm the victim."
translation.zh: ‎责备美国 ‎把自己塑造成受害者

translation.en: [woman] Speaking her mind can get her in trouble.
translation.zh: ‎袒露心声只会给她带来麻烦

translation.en: -[man 3] She looks like an angry woman. -[woman 2] She's not warm and fuzzy.
translation.zh: ‎她就是个愤怒的女人 ‎她一点都不和蔼大方

translation.en: [man 4] She's adding fuel to the fire.
[woman 3] Michelle must think about what she's become in her life.
translation.zh: ‎米歇尔必须认真思考她的所作所为

translation.en: [Michelle] I stopped talking off-the-cuff.
I stopped talking freely.
I used teleprompters.
I had to be much more scripted
translation.zh: ‎我不得不尽量完全照讲稿演说

translation.en: than I had ever been before.
I was just sort of waking up to the...
the truth of who we can be:
so ready to assume the worst in people.
translation.zh: ‎要对人性最险恶的一面做好心理准备

translation.en: The only thing I can do is share that that does hurt.
translation.zh: ‎我能做的就只有说出自己受伤的心情

translation.en: Because if we walk around pretending like it doesn't hurt,
the perpetrator would just say, "Oh, I was just joking.
translation.zh:
‎那些始作俑者就会说
‎“我只是开玩笑的

translation.en: It's just politics."
It's, like, "No, no. No, no.
That changes the shape of a person's soul."
translation.zh: ‎那些所作所为的伤害会直达人的灵魂

translation.en: [Michelle] It's important to have a place that you know as your home.
translation.zh: ‎拥有一个你认为是家的地方很重要

translation.en: One place where people know you, they've seen you grow up,
translation.zh: ‎一个人们认识你 见证你成长

translation.en: where people don't have to make up a story about who you are.
translation.zh: ‎你无需编故事让别人认识你的地方

translation.en: It's what keeps me grounded.
translation.zh: ‎是这样一个家让我保持平衡与理性

translation.en: And this tree has been here forever.
This was the tree where I had one of my first kisses.
translation.zh: ‎我就是在那棵树下接了第一个吻

translation.en: That's it.
She always played everything over and over and over again.
translation.zh: ‎她总是一遍又一遍地弹每一首曲子

translation.en: It had to be perfect.
-The bulb is burned out. -[Michelle] OK.
[Marian] You can tell it's stale in here.
This was the living room.
And this is the...
the radiator that Mom turned into a chimney for Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎曾被我妈改造成圣诞烟囱的散热器

translation.en: And there used to be mirrors on this wall to make this look bigger.
translation.zh:
‎这里原来是镜子
‎用来让这里看起来更宽敞

translation.en: I was a teenager here,
and Barack and I lived here for a year together.
translation.zh: ‎贝拉克和我在这里一起住了一年

translation.en: But this is my dad's chair.
He always had some version of this recliner,
where he would sit and hold court.
And when we all lived here,
his stereo system would be lined up there
translation.zh: ‎他的立体声响系统摆满了那一排

translation.en: with his speakers and all of his jazz albums.
translation.zh: ‎和他的音响和爵士乐专辑一起

translation.en: And the couch was kind of that way.
And he would sit for hours just playing.
translation.zh: ‎他会在这里一坐几小时 听音乐

translation.en: He would get into his mood where he would just want to hear his jazz.
translation.zh: ‎然后沉浸其中 一直听爵士乐

translation.en: You know, he fills up this space.
I think about all that we did,
and I think about my husband, and...
I always think about him coming home from work, coming up those stairs.
translation.zh: ‎想象他下班回到家 走上楼梯

translation.en: But him coming up those stairs was like God returning home.
translation.zh:
‎但他走上楼梯的时候
‎就散发出一种上帝回家的感觉

translation.en: My father had MS.
It's a disease that slowly deteriorates the body.
translation.zh: ‎这是一种会让人的身体逐渐恶化的病

translation.en: I can't help but think of that time right before his death
translation.zh: ‎我总是会想到他去世前那段时间

translation.en: when he struggled to get out that back door just to get to work,
translation.zh: ‎他挣扎着想出门上班的样子

translation.en: not giving up, not in the least.
While his death was sudden,
it was always looming.
The pain of losing him is an emptiness I still haven't gotten over.
translation.zh: ‎我至今依旧没有摆脱失去他的痛苦

translation.en: I think about all that he gave us,
translation.zh: ‎我不禁想起他给我们的一切

translation.en: and all that he wasn't able to see.
He had a way of making people that he was with
translation.zh: ‎他总是有办法让在他身边的人

translation.en: feel his presence. Um...
He just made people feel loved.
[girl] My grandma's from Thailand.
A lot of the culture in the house is kind of influenced by her.
translation.zh: ‎我家的很多文化都有点受她影响

translation.en: And when I was, like, five years old, I got this little pencil skirt
translation.zh:
‎我大概在五岁的时候
‎穿过一条那种铅笔裙

translation.en: and off-the-shoulder top.
[Michelle] Yeah. That's why I tell people we focus too much on stats and not story.
translation.zh:
‎对 我跟别人说我们太关注数据
‎却忽视了故事

translation.en: Stats are, like, "What college are you from?"
translation.zh:
‎数据只会问你
‎“你毕业于那个大学？”

translation.en: But your story is, like,
"What was your grandfather like?"
"Who was your favorite relative and why?"
What advice would you give to someone
translation.zh: ‎你会给那些想避免变成数据的人

translation.en: who's trying to avoid just becoming a stat?
Like, when you go to college you're not just the kid with the 3.0 GPA,
translation.zh:
‎比如你上大学的时候 不止是个
‎平均学分绩点是三的人

translation.en: or when you're applying for jobs,
you're not just that person who graduated top of her class.
How do you avoid just becoming a number?
translation.zh: ‎你会如何避免只是成为一个数字？

translation.en: [Michelle] I think what makes you more than a stat is once you see yourself,
translation.zh:
‎我认为要想自己不止是个数字
‎就只有当你自己…

translation.en: you see yourself as more than a stat,
translation.zh:
‎当你自己
‎不把自己看作一个数字时才行

translation.en: and you start thinking about, "Who are you?
What do you care about? What brings you joy?"
And I hope my story urges you to see the power of your story
translation.zh:
‎我希望我的故事
‎能敦促你看到自己故事的力量

translation.en: and to own that.
[Shayla] Now that I'm going into my senior year,
I'm thinking about how to make sure you're doing the right things.
translation.zh: ‎我在想如何才能确定自己在做对的事

translation.en: So reading Michelle Obama's book,
translation.zh: ‎通过阅读米歇尔奥巴马的书

translation.en: we see that she just slowly started to assert herself,
translation.zh: ‎我们看到她渐渐开始肯定她自己

translation.en: and all those insecurities just become, like...
small voices.
[Shayla] Reading about how her family works...
...I was like, "Wow.
Wow."
That's our family.
[Shayla] In the morning time, we dance through our morning routine.
translation.zh: ‎早上 我们会一边跳舞一边准备

translation.en: We'll just dance through the hallways.
[woman] If they're up, pleasant and having a good morning,
translation.zh: ‎如果他们起来后展开新的一天

translation.en: we're playing some music, you're kind of in good spirits, so...
translation.zh: ‎我们会放音乐 让心情越来越好

translation.en: It helps everybody shake off the cobwebs.
Yesterday's mistake... It's a new day.
translation.zh:
‎昨天的错误就让它过去
‎今天是崭新的一天

translation.en: I do like these curls. Turn, please.
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢这些卷 转过来

translation.en: [Shayla] The sacrifices my mom would make makes me think, like,
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈做出的牺牲让我坚定信念

translation.en: "All right, just strive to do what you can,
and just be prepared for whatever life throws at you."
translation.zh: ‎为生活中所有的可能做好准备

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you, too. Have a good day.
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你
‎-我也爱你 祝你今天愉快

translation.en: [Shayla] I want to be successful, and I also want to impact somebody.
translation.zh: ‎我想成功 我也想影响他人

translation.en: [female moderator] America opened itself up to you
with that historic election.
And I think everybody in this room will remember where they were
translation.zh: ‎我想这里在场每个人都记得

translation.en: on that November evening in 2008.
[Michelle] From the minute that the announcement happened,
the world changed for us.
People came in with briefing books,
and world leaders were calling, right then and there.
translation.zh: ‎立即有世界领导人打电话来

translation.en: So we had to leave the hotel to go to the campaign event,
translation.zh:
‎所以我们不得不离开宾馆
‎去竞选现场

translation.en: and everything is shut down
when the presidential motorcade comes down.
Streets are clean. Nothing is going on.
translation.zh: ‎街上空无一人 一切都安安静静

translation.en: So it's just us in the motorcade,
translation.zh: ‎整条街只有坐在车队里的我们

translation.en: and Malia's like...
"No one's coming to your party, Dad."
translation.zh: ‎“没人来参加你的派对 爸爸”

translation.en: That's what she was saying.
And she was like, "Oh, I feel bad for you."
translation.zh: ‎她说：“爸 我真为你感到难过”

translation.en: I would not be standing here tonight
translation.zh: ‎若没有我最好的朋友在过去16年里

translation.en: without the unyielding support
of my best friend for the last 16 years,
the rock of our family,
the love of my life,
the nation's next First Lady,
Michelle Obama.
[all chant] Yes, we can! Yes, we can!
[bodyguard] We'll take a look first and come back.
[bodyguard 2] Good afternoon.
We're going to be leaving the RON to go to the O2 Arena for this evening's event,
translation.zh:
‎我们要离开RON去O2体育馆
‎参加今晚的活动了

translation.en: which, right now, It was at 93%
when we had our walkthroughs earlier, so approximately 15,000.
translation.zh:
‎根据我们之前的调查
‎这有15000人左右

translation.en: -The venue holds 17,500, all right? -And now it's up to 98%.
translation.zh:
‎-场地容量为17500人 对吗？
‎-但现在已经达到98%了

translation.en: For those of you who have worked these before,
translation.zh: ‎对之前参与过类似任务的人

translation.en: it should be the same footprint, as far as the buildout and everything.
translation.zh:
‎应该遵照之前的位置
‎包括场外和其他所有地方

translation.en: From her hold to the stage is 65 feet.
The stage is five feet tall. And there are the six stairs to the back.
translation.zh: ‎舞台高约1.5米 后面有六个台阶

translation.en: She goes through the hockey tunnel.
-[Michelle] Everything OK, Allen? -[Allen] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-一切都还好吗 艾伦？
‎-是的 夫人

translation.en: One day, I've got to sit and see how the sausage is made.

What did you think life in the White House

I didn't know what the residence part of it looked like,

translation.zh:
‎但我去拜访白宫

‎桌边有管家

translation.en: most of them African-American or Latino older men.
translation.zh:

translation.en: What I spent a lot of time thinking about is,

translation.zh: ‎对我的两个孩子来说像个家？”

translation.en: Because first of all, I didn't want them to grow up thinking
translation.zh:
‎因为首先
‎我不希望她们产生一种概念

translation.en: that grown African-American men served them in tuxedos.
translation.zh:
‎就是非裔美国人
‎要穿无尾礼服服侍她们

translation.en: Because, you know, the truth was that some of those men were my uncles,
translation.zh: ‎因为他们有些可以看作是我的叔叔

translation.en: and they were the Pullman porters, and the folks...
translation.zh:
‎他们当年是铁路上的搬运工人
‎和担任其他仆役的工作

translation.en: And I didn't want my girls to grow up with that image,

It was like, "You can't walk around every day in a full tuxedo," you know?

‎因为孩子们时不时会有朋友过来

translation.en: And it's, like, that just doesn't even look right to me, you know? Um...

‎他们不能每天都帮她们

translation.en: And I am not raising kids that don't know how to make a bed," you know?

‎而我也不会把孩子培养成

translation.en: So...

translation.en: You're dealing with these outside forces

‎我就想

translation.en: but who we wanted to be as an administration:

Now that we're out of the White House,

translation.en: um, yeah, it's better.

because of the color of their skin.

‎然后我们走出了门
‎外面站着一个保镖

translation.en: And I'm telling Malia, "Don't look him in the eye.
Don't say anything.
We're just gonna walk."
So we get downstairs to that front door,
translation.zh:
‎然后我们下了楼
‎走到了那扇前门那里

translation.en: um, and I go to open it, and it's locked.

translation.en: So I am literally shaking it,
and now more Service have been called,
because they don't know what I'm trying to do.
"What is ma'am doing?"
"What is ma'am doing? Where is she going? She still hasn't told us anything."

‎“夫人在干吗？她要去哪？
‎她怎么不告诉我们？”

translation.en: And nobody really wants to ask you,

‎所以我就转向他们说
‎“我就是想出去

I want my daughter and I..."

‎然后我们走了往后面的路
‎终于来到了外面

translation.en: We were, like, off in a corner,

But Malia and I were out.
And I hugged her tight.
But that's sometimes how you feel, like,

‎但它就在那里

Be in school. Get your fricking education.

Everybody here is special, right?

translation.en: so let's not waste it.

translation.en: -[all] Yes. -You know?

translation.zh: ‎那些年并没有白费 对吧？

translation.en: You see that huge crowd out there?
translation.zh: ‎你看到外面那一大群人了吗？

translation.en: And that last speech you gave about, just, like...
People are here because people really believe in love and hope in other people.
translation.zh:
‎人们之所以会在这里
‎是因为他们对别人的爱和信任

translation.en: And also, every time you guys play Stevie Wonder,
translation.zh: ‎而且每次你们放史提夫汪达的时候

translation.en: I don't know, I cry a little bit.
I do.
-Where are Taylor and Jane? -[Malia] They're just in the car.
They're in the car? Everybody's in the car already?
translation.zh:
‎他们在车上？
‎所有人都已经到车上了吗？

translation.en: [Michelle] It's so nice to see you all.
[woman] Nice to see you!
[Michelle] What were you all gonna talk about?
[women] Becoming.
I want to eavesdrop.
We saw you last night,
and you said that you missed your spiritual community.
So I want to ask our group,
what advice would you give our First Lady?
translation.zh: ‎你们想给第一夫人什么建议？

translation.en: [woman] The first reaction, really, is you've got to find your life again.
translation.zh:
‎我的第一反应是
‎你应该找回属于自己的生活

translation.en: There are so many different phases of you,
and a lot of them you forget while you're childrearing,
translation.zh:
‎但你在经历生孩子、结婚
‎和许多其他事后

translation.en: and married, and all that stuff.
So my advice to you is just do what you're doing.
translation.zh:
‎所以我给你的建议就是
‎继续做你现在做的事

translation.en: -Keep on doing it. -[woman 2] Yes.
As my mother says, give it some time.
translation.zh:
‎就跟我妈妈说的一样
‎“给自己点时间”

translation.en: And I'm so glad you did not get yourself
wrapped up in the fluff of being the First Lady
translation.zh: ‎在你做第一夫人和住在白宫期间

translation.en: and living in the White House,
and, "My husband is..."
[Michelle] Your view of me matters.
Every time we showed up, we showed up to make you all proud.
translation.zh: ‎我们每次出现就是为了让你们自豪

translation.en: [woman 2] Right. And you did. You did that.
When I saw you on television, when you were inaugurated,
translation.zh: ‎我在电视上看你的就职典礼时

translation.en: I said, "I never thought that I would ever see..."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“我从没想过
‎我能见证这时刻”

translation.en: [woman] Right. My mother said the same thing.
And I look back, and my mother and my father had never seen it.
translation.zh:
‎当我回顾过去
‎想到我父母没能见到这样的时刻

translation.en: It was something.
-I thank you and Barack for that. -[woman] You saw it for them.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你和贝拉克
‎-你替他们见证了

translation.en: I saw it.
So it is a blessing.
-Yeah. -[woman 3] Michelle, I thank you.
So God is good.
-And you will always be First Lady to me. -You will always be First Lady.
translation.zh:
‎-你在我心中永远是第一夫人
‎-你将永远是第一夫人

translation.en: -Forever First Lady. -You will always be First Lady.
translation.zh:
‎-永远的第一夫人
‎-你永远都是第一夫人

translation.en: [women] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
[Michelle] You guys!
♪ Happy birthday, dear ma'am ♪
Old ma'am.
Oh, you can see the "ma'am."
♪ ...to you ♪
-[Michelle] I'm rounding to 60. -[woman] I know.
-Yay! -I can still blow out the candles.
-Thanks, you guys. -[woman 2] A little gift.
-[woman] Oh, yeah. -A gift?
-[woman 2] A very not round-to-sixty gift. -A gift!
What happens when you round to 60?
-Yikes! -[woman] Yeah.
OK. Is it a magnifying glass?
There you go.
Oh, it's a selfie-cam!
-[woman] Yes. -[woman 2] That will come in handy.
[woman] Look at the camera, not the remote.
OK.
What's next in life?
[Michelle] I want to keep working with young people.
translation.zh: ‎我想继续和年轻人一起共事

translation.en: The future of our nation is up to the next generation.
translation.zh: ‎我国的命运掌握在我们下一代手中

translation.en: But I know that doesn't just happen.
translation.zh: ‎我也知道一切不会自然发生

translation.en: Young people need some encouragement.
You've got my eyelashes.
-Hi. -[woman] Hi, Michelle.
[Michelle] All right, get it done. Get it done.
How are you?
[Michelle] I love you. You guys are up next, OK? So proud of you.
translation.zh:
‎我爱你们 你们就是我们的未来
‎我为你感到自豪

translation.en: Barack and I are empty-nesters,
and that has been exhilarating:
to watch the two little beings you were in charge of grow up.
translation.zh: ‎逐渐成长 让我们很激动

translation.en: [woman] I'm excited for her to be proud of what she's done,
translation.zh: ‎我希望她能为自己的成就感到自豪

translation.en: because I think that's the most important thing for a human to do
translation.zh: ‎因为我认为那是人最需要的

translation.en: is to be proud of themselves.
[Malia] No longer facing that same scrutiny,
being able to let all of that leave your mind,
creates so much more space.
[Michelle] I want to take care of me,
rediscover my husband...
[Michelle] My life is starting to be mine again.
translation.zh: ‎我的生活又回到了我自己手上

translation.en: There is another chapter waiting for me out there.
translation.zh: ‎我要去开启生命的下一篇章

translation.en: ♪ Just a sweet word ♪
-[Stephen] Tonight, the 34-stop tour ends. -This is it, y'all.
translation.zh:
‎-这里是34座城市巡回的终点站
‎-对 没错

translation.en: This is it.
What has this journey been like?
What have you learned, maybe about yourself?
translation.zh: ‎你学到了什么吗？比如关于自己的

translation.en: And what has surprised you most about your travels?
translation.zh:
‎整段旅途中
‎最让你惊讶的事是什么？

translation.en: I've had the rare experience to see the world in this way,
translation.zh:
‎我从未有过这种机会
‎以这种方式看世界

translation.en: which is why I feel like I've got to share with you all
that, you know, the energy that's out there
translation.zh: ‎就是我们这里所拥有的力量

translation.en: is much better than what we see.
I wish people didn't feel badly,
because this country is good.
People are good.
People are decent.
I tell you what I'm nostalgic for.
I miss the opportunity we had
to have leaders who talked to us about hope,
and the possibility of change, which is what hope is.
translation.zh:
‎和改变的总统
‎而改变的可能性就是希望

translation.en: Well...
here's what I've learned just in this book tour.
translation.zh: ‎我在这次巡回书展中认识到的是

translation.en: You know, one of the things we do miss about Barack Obama
translation.zh:
‎我们怀念贝拉克奥巴马的
‎其中一件事是

translation.en: is that he would get out into the country
and he would campaign around hope,
and he would fill arenas,
and then people would come out and remember,
translation.zh: ‎人们会走出来 然后回想

translation.en: "Yeah. Yeah. Yeah."
[Michelle] "I do like this."
And then people would be surrounded with each other,
of all different backgrounds, and they'd go,
"Yeah, I'm not alone in this.
I like this feeling of not being divided.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢这种团结一致的感觉

translation.en: I do."
If we can open up a little bit more to each other and share our stories,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们能对彼此更加敞开心扉
‎分享自己的故事

translation.en: our real stories,
that's what breaks down barriers.
But in order to do that,
you have to believe that your story has value.
translation.zh: ‎你们就要相信自己的故事是有价值的

translation.en: Be vulnerable. Dare to be vulnerable.
translation.zh: ‎展现自己的脆弱 勇于袒露

translation.en: We're at a crossroads
of where we have to think about,
"Who are we as a nation?"
translation.zh: ‎“作为一个国家 我们是谁？”

translation.en: I remain hopeful that people want better...
translation.zh: ‎我一直都相信人们想要变更好

translation.en: ...if not for themselves, then for the next generation.
translation.zh:
‎就算不会为了他们自己
‎也会为了下一代

translation.en: And that is my basic joy.
You know, it gets back to mentoring others.
translation.zh: ‎这就又回归了我指导别人的老本行

translation.en: That's what I'm going to do until people are like,
translation.zh: ‎我会继续做下去 直到别人拦下我说

translation.en: "OK, you're done, old lady."
translation.zh: ‎“好了 老太太 可以了”

translation.en: I'll just be on stage in a wheelchair,
translation.zh: ‎我就坐在轮椅上 在舞台上

translation.en: just going, "And another thing..."
You know? And they'll be, like, "Oh, that little old Michelle Obama.
translation.zh:
‎然后他们说
‎“那个米歇尔奥巴马老太太

translation.en: She's still just talking," you know?
I want to be the 90-year-old woman that you just excuse, you know?
translation.zh:
‎我想成为那个
‎让你想抱怨的90岁老太太

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, join me in thanking Michelle Obama for being here tonight.
translation.zh:
‎女士们、先生们 我们一起
‎感谢米歇尔奥巴马今晚的出席

translation.en: Thank you all so much.
-I am becoming a strong... -Yes.
-...confident, fierce girl... -Yes.
...who realizes that I have the power to change the world.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我有能力改变这个世界

translation.en: -[audience cheering] -Yeah!
I am a nonbinary human.
And, um, I am becoming brave
and unafraid to live openly,
truthfully and joyfully.
I am becoming a mom who is teaching my teenage boys
translation.zh:
‎我在成为一个母亲
‎教育我正值青春期的儿子们

translation.en: to value and respect strong, smart, independent women.
translation.zh: ‎珍惜和尊敬坚强、聪慧、独立的女性

translation.en: Thank you!
My parents emigrated from Mexico,
and because of them,
I am becoming a man who is living the American Dream.
translation.zh: ‎我在成为一个实现美国梦的人
